aors.model.agtsim.sim
Class DefaultAgentSimulator

java.lang.Object
  aors.model.agtsim.sim.DefaultAgentSimulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentSimulatorFacade, AgentSimulator, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class DefaultAgentSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentSimulator, AgentSimulatorFacade

DefaultAgentSimulator, default implementation of the AgentSimulator-Interface. Used in the standalone-version of the AOR-JSim.

Since:
May 25, 2008
See Also:

setSimClassLoader

public void setSimClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader simClassLoader)
Description copied from interface: AgentSimulator
Sets the class loader to use for constructing specialized ActionEvents from JSON code that was sent from an external agent. This method is used in the WebSim and may not be removed.

Specified by:

simClassLoader - The classloader for loading class files of generated source

getSubjectProperties

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getSubjectProperties()
Description copied from interface: AgentSimulatorFacade
Returns a map of custom properties (SelfBeliefs) of the simulated AgentSubject. The map is being used to initialize external agents. This method is called from the AgentSimulatorProxy.

Description copied from interface: AgentSimulator
Notifies the AgentSimulator that the simulation has ended. Used in the Websimulator to let the externally controlled agent know that the simulation has ended. This method is called from AbstractSimulator.
